item.title: Road surface sunk below normal level, 23rd October
item.description:
This problem is located on the junctions of Hurst Road, Parkwood Road and Warwick Close. The problem occurred originally following Thames Water leak investigation 2023/4 when a large trench had to be dug. At that time the road had a slight depression. Noticed that the road is now more depressed following completion of resurfacing Hurst Road (from War Memorial to Parkwood Road), week ending 17th October 2025. Our concern is whether it could sink further and become unsafe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Parkwood Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
